item.title: How to Activate Bluetooth With Just A Terminal on Linux
item.description: Intro bluetooth is one of the technologies that must exist in every computer device, because of its many, many uses, not only for file transfers, but bluetooth can also be used to connect sound wirelessly.

item.title: How to Ignore Certain Packages To Upgrade in Archlinux
item.description: Background sometimes when we want to update a package, there are things we want to ignore to update.
